leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 物理-粒子/多体/动力学生态

queries: [WEB] molecular dynamics trajectory analysis tools github
[WEB] python library for MD analysis visualization github
[WEB] molecular visualization software open source github

tools.name: 4C
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive multiphysics simulation framework for continuum mechanics
tools.detailed_description: 4C is a comprehensive multiphysics simulation framework written in C++ that focuses on continuum mechanics and related fields, providing capabilities for complex physical simulations.

tools.name: molview
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter widget for interactive molecular visualization based on Mol*
tools.detailed_description: An IPython/Jupyter widget that brings the capabilities of the Mol* (Molstar) viewer into the notebook environment for interactive molecular visualization.

tools.name: ADplugin
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for AutoDock/Vina molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the PyMOL molecular visualization system that integrates AutoDock and Vina, allowing users to set up and analyze molecular docking simulations directly within PyMOL.

tools.name: Alphafold2import
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin to import AlphaFold2 models from EMBL database
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin that facilitates the fetching and importing of AlphaFold2 predicted protein structures hosted by EMBL directly into the PyMOL environment.

tools.name: cpptraj
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and robust trajectory analysis tool for Amber and other MD packages
tools.detailed_description: Cpptraj is the main trajectory analysis tool for the Amber Molecular Dynamics package, capable of reading and processing a wide variety of trajectory and topology formats.

tools.name: Jupyter_Dock
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive molecular docking protocols in Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A set of Jupyter Notebooks designed to perform molecular docking protocols interactively, including visualization, file format conversion, and result analysis.

tools.name: molecular-design-toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Notebook-integrated tools for molecular simulation and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit that integrates molecular simulation and visualization capabilities directly into Jupyter notebooks, facilitating computational chemistry workflows.

tools.name: notebook-molecular-visualization
tools.one_line_profile: 2D and 3D molecular visualization in Jupyter notebooks
tools.detailed_description: Provides capabilities for embedding 2D and 3D molecular visualizations within Jupyter notebooks using 3Dmol.js and D3.js libraries.

tools.name: PyMOL-PUB
tools.one_line_profile: Plugin for generating publication-quality structure figures in PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin designed to streamline the creation of high-quality, publication-ready molecular structure figures.

tools.name: PyMolSAR
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for molecular feature computation and activity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit used to compute molecular features and predict biological activities and properties of small molecules, often used in SAR studies.

tools.name: hop
tools.one_line_profile: Solvent network analysis tool based on MDAnalysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python package based on MDAnalysis for analyzing solvation dynamics and solvent networks in molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: imdclient
tools.one_line_profile: Client for streaming analysis from running MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python client for performing streaming analysis on molecular dynamics simulations while they are running, supporting interactive MD workflows.

tools.name: propkatraj
tools.one_line_profile: pKa estimates for proteins using MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A tool to calculate pKa values for protein residues across an ensemble of structures from molecular dynamics trajectories.

tools.name: zarrtraj
tools.one_line_profile: MDAnalysis toolkit for Zarr-based trajectory storage
tools.detailed_description: An MDAKit that provides functionality for reading and writing molecular dynamics trajectories using the Zarr format within the MDAnalysis ecosystem.

tools.name: ASAP
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic Selection And Prediction tools for structural analysis
tools.detailed_description: ASAP is a python package for quickly analyzing and visualizing datasets of crystal or molecular structures, often used in conjunction with machine learning potentials.

tools.name: ring-pymol
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for Residue Interaction Network Generator (RING)
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin that visualizes residue interaction networks generated by the RING software, aiding in the analysis of protein structure stability and function.

tools.name: MasterMSM
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for generating Markov State Models
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for the construction and analysis of Markov State Models (MSMs) from molecular dynamics simulation data.

tools.name: domhmm
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to identify nano- and microdomains in membrane MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: An open source package used to identify and analyze lipid domains (nano- and microdomains) in molecular dynamics simulations of biological membranes.

tools.name: NetworkGT
tools.one_line_profile: Network Geometry and Topology Toolbox for fracture networks
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for the geometrical and topological analysis of fracture networks, applicable in geophysics and materials science.

tools.name: Jmol-SwingJS
tools.one_line_profile: SwingJS-compatible version of Jmol/JSmol
tools.detailed_description: A version of the Jmol molecular visualization and analysis tool compatible with SwingJS, enabling Java-based molecular tools to run in web environments.

tools.name: Molecules
tools.one_line_profile: 3D molecular visualizer for iOS
tools.detailed_description: An open-source application for viewing and manipulating 3D molecular structures on iOS devices.

tools.name: MoleculesMac
tools.one_line_profile: 3D molecular visualizer for macOS
tools.detailed_description: The macOS desktop version of the Molecules application for visualizing 3D molecular structures.

tools.name: MolecularNodes
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular animation and visualization in Blender via Geometry Nodes
tools.detailed_description: A Blender add-on that enables the import and manipulation of molecular data using Geometry Nodes for high-quality visualization and animation.

tools.name: Caleydo
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization framework for molecular biology data
tools.detailed_description: Caleydo is a visualization framework and tool designed to help life science experts analyze and explore large-scale molecular biology data.

tools.name: DISC
tools.one_line_profile: Single-molecule trajectory idealization tool
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB tool for single-molecule trajectory idealization using divisive segmentation and clustering, developed by ChandaLab.

tools.name: DuIvyTools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for processing and visualizing GROMACS MD results
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based toolkit designed to assist in the processing and visualization of molecular dynamics simulation results, specifically from GROMACS.

tools.name: colvars
tools.one_line_profile: Collective variables library for molecular simulation
tools.detailed_description: A software module for molecular simulation programs that provides a flexible and robust implementation of collective variables and enhanced sampling methods.

tools.name: phlower
tools.one_line_profile: Trajectory analysis using Hodge decomposition
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that utilizes Hodge decomposition for the analysis of trajectories, providing insights into the global structure of dynamics.

tools.name: pymol-remote
tools.one_line_profile: Remote interface for PyMOL visualization from compute clusters
tools.detailed_description: A utility to send data to and from a local PyMOL instance from a remote server, facilitating visualization workflows where heavy computation (e.g., deep learning, MD) occurs on a cluster.

tools.name: CueMol
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive molecular visualization framework
tools.detailed_description: CueMol is a molecular visualization framework designed to visualize crystallographic data and molecular coordinates, supporting various rendering modes and scene setups.

tools.name: msys
tools.one_line_profile: System preparation and analysis library for molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A library developed by D. E. Shaw Research for preparing and analyzing chemical systems for molecular dynamics simulations, handling topology and structure data.

tools.name: Building-Regulariser
tools.one_line_profile: Geospatial tool for regularizing building footprints
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for cleaning and regularizing building footprints in geospatial data, aligning edges to principal directions and simplifying polygons for accurate analysis.

tools.name: u-track
tools.one_line_profile: Multiple-particle tracking software for dense fields
tools.detailed_description: A software package for multiple-particle tracking, designed to handle dense particle fields, close gaps in trajectories, and capture merging/splitting events in biological or physical imaging data.

tools.name: Persistence
tools.one_line_profile: Topological Data Analysis (TDA) library for Haskell
tools.detailed_description: A library for computing persistent homology and other topological features from data, enabling topological data analysis in the Haskell programming environment.

tools.name: vmd-python
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for Visual Molecular Dynamics (VMD)
tools.detailed_description: An installable Python module that wraps the VMD (Visual Molecular Dynamics) software, allowing VMD's analysis and visualization capabilities to be used directly within Python scripts.

tools.name: PathCV
tools.one_line_profile: Path collective variable implementation for PLUMED
tools.detailed_description: Source code for the Path collective variable implementation within the PLUMED software, used for enhanced sampling and free energy calculations along a defined path.

tools.name: LITAP
tools.one_line_profile: R package for terrain analysis and hydrology modeling
tools.detailed_description: An R package for terrain analysis, landscape, and hydrology models, building on LandMapR methodologies to calculate flow topology and landform segmentation.

tools.name: FairRoot
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation and analysis framework for particle physics
tools.detailed_description: A C++ framework for simulation, reconstruction, and analysis of particle physics experiments, providing a base for developing experiment-specific software.

tools.name: PINES
tools.one_line_profile: Permutationally Invariant Networks for Enhanced Sampling
tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing Permutationally Invariant Networks for Enhanced Sampling (PINES) to improve sampling efficiency in molecular simulations.

tools.name: loosely_coupled_ekf
tools.one_line_profile: Loosely-coupled Error State EKF for ROS
tools.detailed_description: A ROS node implementing a 6-DOF loosely-coupled error state Extended Kalman Filter (EKF) for state estimation in robotics and navigation.

tools.name: GEMDAT
tools.one_line_profile: Python toolkit for molecular dynamics analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit designed for the analysis of molecular dynamics simulations, facilitating the extraction of insights from trajectory data.

tools.name: GUDHI
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Topological Data Analysis (TDA)
tools.detailed_description: A generic open-source C++ library with a Python interface for Topological Data Analysis (TDA) and Higher Dimensional Geometry Understanding, offering state-of-the-art algorithms for persistent homology.

tools.name: global-chem
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical knowledge graph and toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A knowledge graph and software toolkit mapping common chemical names to their molecular definitions (SMILES, InChI), facilitating chemical data integration and informatics.

tools.name: LOOS
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight Object-Oriented Structure analysis library
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight C++ library for analyzing molecular dynamics simulations and structural biology data, designed for ease of use and creating new analysis tools.

tools.name: CONAN
tools.one_line_profile: Contact analysis tool for MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the analysis of inter-atomic contacts in molecular dynamics trajectories, providing statistical and time-dependent analysis of interactions.

tools.name: MD-IFP
tools.one_line_profile: MD trajectory analysis using Interaction Fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: Tools for analyzing Molecular Dynamics trajectories by calculating and visualizing protein-ligand Interaction Fingerprints (IFP).

tools.name: mdgo
tools.one_line_profile: MD simulation setup and analysis codebase
tools.detailed_description: A codebase for setting up classical molecular dynamics simulations and analyzing the results, developed by the Hou Group.

tools.name: MDANSE
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Dynamics Analysis for Neutron Scattering Experiments
tools.detailed_description: An interactive program for computing neutron scattering observables from molecular dynamics trajectories, bridging simulation and experiment.

tools.name: Correlation
tools.one_line_profile: Material correlation function calculator
tools.detailed_description: A C++ program that calculates main correlation functions of a material, including Radial Distribution Function (RDF), Pair Distribution Function (PDF), and Plane Angle Distribution (PAD).

tools.name: metadynminer.py
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of Plumed metadynamics HILLS files
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for efficient reading, plotting, and analysis of HILLS files generated by Plumed metadynamics simulations, inspired by the R metadynminer package.

tools.name: trajr
tools.one_line_profile: R package for trajectory analysis of animal movement
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox to assist with the statistical analysis of 2-dimensional animal trajectories. It provides functions for calculating metrics like speed, acceleration, and tortuosity, and for resampling and smoothing trajectory data.

tools.name: PymolFold
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for protein folding visualization and prediction
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for PyMOL that interfaces with protein folding prediction services (like ESMFold) to predict and visualize protein structures directly within the PyMOL environment.

tools.name: Drifters.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Trajectory simulations for particles in Ocean and Atmosphere
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for computing the trajectories of point particles (drifters) in oceanic and atmospheric flow fields, useful for climate science and fluid dynamics simulations.

tools.name: Kitware Glance
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based visualization tool for volumetric and geometric data
tools.detailed_description: An open-source web application for visualizing volumetric images, molecular structures, geometric objects, and point clouds. It serves as a standalone viewer or a foundation for custom web-based visualization applications using VTK.js.

tools.name: PyBILT
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for lipid bilayer molecular simulation analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit designed to aid in the analysis of lipid bilayer molecular dynamics trajectories, offering specialized functions for membrane properties.

tools.name: MDAPackmol
tools.one_line_profile: MDAnalysis wrapper for Packmol
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper that integrates the Packmol software with MDAnalysis, allowing users to generate initial configurations for molecular dynamics simulations programmatically.

tools.name: MDAnalysisData
tools.one_line_profile: Datasets for MDAnalysis testing and workshops
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing programmatic access to standard molecular dynamics datasets, used for testing, benchmarking, and educational purposes within the MDAnalysis ecosystem.

tools.name: mdacli
tools.one_line_profile: Command line interface for MDAnalysis
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool that exposes MDAnalysis functionality, allowing users to perform common trajectory analysis tasks without writing Python scripts.

tools.name: MDAnalysis
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for analyzing molecular dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A robust and widely used Python library for the analysis of molecular dynamics trajectories. It supports a wide range of file formats and provides tools for distance calculation, alignment, and custom analysis.

tools.name: membrane-curvature
tools.one_line_profile: MDAnalysis tool to calculate membrane curvature
tools.detailed_description: A specialized tool within the MDAnalysis ecosystem for calculating and mapping the curvature of lipid membranes from molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: pmda
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel algorithms for MDAnalysis
tools.detailed_description: A library that implements parallel analysis algorithms for MDAnalysis, enabling faster processing of large molecular dynamics trajectories using multiprocessing.

tools.name: dsatools
tools.one_line_profile: Digital signal analysis library for Python
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for digital signal processing and analysis, including methods like ARMA, SSA, DMD, and EMD, applicable to various scientific data streams.

tools.name: OpticalRayTracer
tools.one_line_profile: Optical ray tracing simulation in MATLAB
tools.detailed_description: A simulation tool based on Snell's law and Fresnel equations for performing optical ray tracing, useful for optics and physics education or simple modeling.

tools.name: pytim
tools.one_line_profile: Interfacial analysis of molecular simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for identifying and analyzing fluid interfaces in molecular simulations, supporting various methods for surface identification and property calculation.

tools.name: GetBox-PyMOL-Plugin
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL Plugin for calculating docking boxes
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for PyMOL that assists in defining and calculating the docking box coordinates for molecular docking software like LeDock, AutoDock, and AutoDock Vina.

tools.name: gamd-openmm
tools.one_line_profile: Gaussian Accelerated Molecular Dynamics for OpenMM
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Gaussian Accelerated Molecular Dynamics (GaMD) for the OpenMM toolkit, enabling enhanced sampling and free energy calculations for biomolecules.

tools.name: trajectory-cluster
tools.one_line_profile: Trajectory Clustering: Partition-and-Group Framework
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of a partition-and-group framework for trajectory clustering, useful for analyzing movement patterns in spatial data.

tools.name: MobilityDB
tools.one_line_profile: Geospatial trajectory data management platform
tools.detailed_description: An extension for PostgreSQL and PostGIS that adds support for temporal and spatio-temporal objects, enabling efficient management and analysis of geospatial trajectory data.

tools.name: ili
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based visualization of molecular maps
tools.detailed_description: A web-based application for the 2D and 3D visualization of molecular maps and spatial data, facilitating the exploration of molecular cartography.

tools.name: EasyPyMOL
tools.one_line_profile: Script to facilitate the creation of horizontal scripts for PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: EasyPyMOL is a utility script designed to streamline the workflow in PyMOL by facilitating the creation of horizontal scripts, enhancing productivity for structural biology visualization.

tools.name: jupyterlabpymolpysnips
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL code snippets for JupyterLab integration
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python snippets for PyMOL designed to be run in JupyterLab via the jupyterlab-snippets-multimenus extension, facilitating interactive molecular visualization workflows.

tools.name: pymolshortcuts
tools.one_line_profile: Productivity shortcuts and extensions for PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A collection of shortcuts loaded on PyMOL startup to enable web searches from within the application and provide convenient functions for enhanced productivity in molecular visualization.

tools.name: PathDetect-SOM
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of molecular dynamics pathways using Self-Organizing Maps
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing pathways sampled in molecular dynamics simulations using Self-Organizing Maps (SOM) to cluster and visualize trajectory data.

tools.name: lindemann
tools.one_line_profile: Python package to calculate the Lindemann index from LAMMPS trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to calculate the Lindemann index, a measure of thermal agitation and melting, from molecular dynamics trajectories generated by LAMMPS.

tools.name: OTSOpy
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for the OTSO magnetosphere trajectory tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for interacting with the OTSO tool, used for computing trajectories of charged particles in the Earth's magnetosphere.

tools.name: INS_LOOSE
tools.one_line_profile: Inertial navigation system solution for in-pipe inspection
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based solution for inertial navigation systems (INS) in in-pipe inspection, utilizing a 15-state extended Kalman filter for estimating errors in angle, speed, position, and sensor biases.

tools.name: Avogadro
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced cross-platform molecular editor and visualization tool
tools.detailed_description: Avogadro is an advanced molecular editor designed for cross-platform use in computational chemistry, molecular modeling, bioinformatics, and materials science, supporting 3D rendering and data analysis.

tools.name: AvogadroLibs
tools.one_line_profile: Libraries for 3D rendering and analysis in computational chemistry
tools.detailed_description: The core libraries for Avogadro, providing 3D rendering, visualization, analysis, and data processing capabilities for computational chemistry and molecular modeling applications.

tools.name: Trajan
tools.one_line_profile: Trajectory analysis package for simulated and observed trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for analyzing simulated and observed trajectories, primarily developed for oceanographic drift simulations but applicable to general trajectory analysis.

tools.name: OTAnalytics
tools.one_line_profile: Traffic analysis tool for road user trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to perform traffic analysis on trajectories of road users, enabling the study of traffic dynamics and behavior.

tools.name: PedPy
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of pedestrian dynamics from trajectory files
tools.detailed_description: A library for the analysis of pedestrian dynamics based on trajectory files, providing tools to compute density, velocity, and flow profiles.

tools.name: molorbdraw
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for visualizing molecular orbitals from cube files
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to visualize molecular orbitals directly from cube files, facilitating the analysis of electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: plumed2-mcp-server
tools.one_line_profile: Smart input generator for PLUMED2 enhanced sampling
tools.detailed_description: An MCP-based assistant for generating and validating PLUMED input files for molecular dynamics enhanced sampling, supporting metadynamics and umbrella sampling.

tools.name: PyVT
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for vessel spatio-temporal trajectory analysis
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python toolkit for the preprocessing and analysis of vessel spatio-temporal trajectories, useful for maritime traffic studies.

tools.name: StressTopOpt
tools.one_line_profile: 3D sensitivity analysis code for stress-based topology optimization
tools.detailed_description: An efficient MATLAB implementation for 3D sensitivity analysis in stress-based topology optimization, useful for structural mechanics and materials design.

tools.name: prolint2
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for analyzing lipid-protein interactions from MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: Prolint2 is an optimized tool for analyzing and visualizing lipid-protein interactions from molecular dynamics trajectories, providing insights into membrane protein dynamics.

tools.name: Pymol-script-repo
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of scripts and plugins for PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive repository of scripts and plugins for PyMOL, extending its functionality for various molecular visualization and analysis tasks.

tools.name: MD-TASK
tools.one_line_profile: Suite for network analysis and PRS of MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A tool suite for analyzing molecular dynamics trajectories using network analysis and Perturbation Response Scanning (PRS) to identify allosteric communication pathways.

tools.name: RadialDistributionFunction
tools.one_line_profile: Utility to compute radial distribution functions (RDF)
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance utility that computes the radial distribution function (RDF) of particle positions, supporting CPU and GPU acceleration.

tools.name: sfts
tools.one_line_profile: Short Fourier Transforms for Fresnel-weighted Template summation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing Short Fourier Transforms for Fresnel-weighted Template summation, useful in specific signal processing or physics applications involving Fresnel patterns.

tools.name: ARCADE
tools.one_line_profile: Artillery Crater Analysis and Detection Engine
tools.detailed_description: The ARtillery Crater Analysis and Detection Engine (ARCADE) is a computer vision tool that scans satellite imagery for artillery craters and calculates inbound projectile trajectories.

tools.name: VIA
tools.one_line_profile: Trajectory inference tool for high-dimensional data
tools.detailed_description: VIA (Variational Inference Analysis) is a tool for trajectory inference in high-dimensional data, commonly used in single-cell analysis but applicable to general topology-preserving trajectory reconstruction.

tools.name: SAXS-guidedAdaptiveSampling
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive sampling for MD guided by SAXS data
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Markov state model-based adaptive sampling for molecular dynamics simulations, guided by Small-Angle X-ray Scattering (SAXS) and hybrid information.

tools.name: OCDM
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB implementation of Orthogonal Chirp Division Multiplexing for signal processing
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based solver for Orthogonal Chirp Division Multiplexing (OCDM) utilizing Discrete Fresnel Transform, designed for simulating and analyzing signal properties in optical or wireless communication physics.

tools.name: GNSS_INS_LooseCouple
tools.one_line_profile: GNSS/INS loosely coupled integration using Kalman Filter
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation for calculating trajectory and navigation states by fusing GNSS and INS data via a loosely coupled Kalman Filter approach, suitable for geodesy and navigation physics.

tools.name: molecular-ts
tools.one_line_profile: Virtual chemistry simulation and particle automata visualization
tools.detailed_description: A TypeScript-based simulation engine for virtual chemistry and particle automata, providing 2D and 3D visualization of particle behavior and artificial life dynamics.

tools.name: FZA_lensless_imaging
tools.one_line_profile: Lensless imaging reconstruction using Fresnel zone plate
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolkit for lensless imaging simulations and reconstruction, specifically utilizing Fresnel zone plates for optical physics research.

tools.name: htp_md
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput molecular dynamics trajectory analysis infrastructure
tools.detailed_description: A Python library and infrastructure for high-throughput analysis of molecular dynamics trajectories, facilitating data management and structural analysis in materials science.

tools.name: MDV
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Dimensional Visualization toolkit for spatial and molecular datasets
tools.detailed_description: An open-source toolkit designed for analyzing and visualizing spatial and molecular datasets, supporting multi-dimensional data representation for scientific research.

tools.name: VisualFactory
tools.one_line_profile: Cinematic molecular visualization scripts
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts designed to produce high-quality, cinematic visualizations of molecular structures and dynamics with scientific accuracy.

tools.name: hmmTMB
tools.one_line_profile: Hidden Markov Models fitting using Template Model Builder
tools.detailed_description: An R package for fitting flexible hidden Markov models using TMB, often applied to animal movement trajectory analysis and ecological modeling.

tools.name: AMDock
tools.one_line_profile: Assisted molecular docking interface for AutoDock4 and AutoDock Vina
tools.detailed_description: A graphical tool to assist and automate molecular docking procedures using AutoDock4 and AutoDock Vina, streamlining the preparation and execution of docking simulations.

tools.name: AMDock-win
tools.one_line_profile: Windows version of AMDock for assisted molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: The Windows implementation of AMDock, facilitating assisted molecular docking with AutoDock4 and AutoDock Vina on Windows platforms.

tools.name: VMD
tools.one_line_profile: Variational Mode Decomposition (VMD) and variants
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of Variational Mode Decomposition and its variants, used for signal processing and decomposing non-stationary signals in physics and engineering.

tools.name: SynMob
tools.one_line_profile: Synthetic GPS trajectory dataset generator for urban mobility
tools.detailed_description: A tool for creating high-fidelity synthetic GPS trajectory datasets to support urban mobility analysis and algorithm development.

tools.name: E2DTC
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-End Deep Trajectory Clustering Framework
tools.detailed_description: An end-to-end deep learning framework for trajectory clustering via self-training, enabling analysis of movement patterns in spatial data.

tools.name: TrajEdge
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight trajectory data analysis framework for edge environments
tools.detailed_description: An efficient framework designed for trajectory data analysis in edge computing environments, optimizing processing for mobility data.

tools.name: Human-Mobility-Analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for individual and crowd-level human mobility analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit for analyzing human mobility based on trajectory data, including destination prediction and calculation of spatiotemporal features like radius of gyration and travel rhythm.

tools.name: FastMDAnalysis
tools.one_line_profile: Automated analysis software for molecular dynamics trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A software package designed to automate the analysis of molecular dynamics trajectories, streamlining the extraction of physical properties from simulation data.

tools.name: Loose-GNSS-IMU
tools.one_line_profile: Loosely coupled GNSS and IMU integration
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation for the loosely coupled integration of GNSS and IMU data, used for precise trajectory estimation and navigation.

tools.name: Wave-Optics-Simulations
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB simulations for wave optics and diffraction
tools.detailed_description: A collection of MATLAB scripts for modelling wave optics phenomena, including scalar diffraction theory, Fresnel, and Fraunhofer diffraction simulations.

tools.name: pyMOTO
tools.one_line_profile: Modular Python framework for topology optimization
tools.detailed_description: A modular framework for topology optimization in physics and engineering, allowing for the design of structures with optimal material distribution.

tools.name: DynaPhoPy
tools.one_line_profile: Phonon anharmonicity analysis from molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A software tool to calculate phonon properties and analyze anharmonicity from molecular dynamics trajectories, bridging the gap between MD and lattice dynamics.

tools.name: fresnaq
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Fresnel scalar diffraction from binary occulters
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB/Octave library for fast computation of Fresnel scalar diffraction patterns from binary occulters and apertures, useful in optics simulations.

tools.name: topotools
tools.one_line_profile: VMD plugin for manipulating topology information
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for VMD (Visual Molecular Dynamics) that provides tools for manipulating molecular topology information, enabling complex system setup and analysis.

tools.name: hidden-markov-model
tools.one_line_profile: From-scratch Hidden Markov Model implementation
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Hidden Markov Models for learning hidden states from observation sequences, applicable to statistical modeling of sequential data.

tools.name: Calc-ScatPat
tools.one_line_profile: Huygens-Fresnel principle implementation for metasurface scattering
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB tool implementing the Huygens-Fresnel principle to calculate scattering farfield patterns from finite-aperture rectangular metasurfaces.

tools.name: atomify
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time molecular dynamics simulation and visualization in the browser
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool for running and visualizing molecular dynamics simulations in real-time using LAMMPS compiled to WebAssembly. It allows users to interact with simulations directly in the browser.

tools.name: 4F-Optical-Correlator-Simulation
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB simulation for 4F Optical Correlator systems
tools.detailed_description: A simulation tool for 4F Correlator systems based on the Fourier transforming properties of lenses, allowing for the study of optical signal processing and pattern recognition.

tools.name: PAOS
tools.one_line_profile: Physical Optics Analysis and Simulation package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for Physical Optics studies, providing tools for optical propagation and analysis, developed within the context of the Ariel Space Mission.

tools.name: st-speckmol
tools.one_line_profile: Streamlit component for molecular structure visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that integrates Speck, a WebGL-based molecular renderer, into Streamlit apps, enabling interactive 3D visualization of molecular structures in web applications.

tools.name: TrajectoryClustering
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic clustering tool for 2D trajectory data
tools.detailed_description: A Python application for fully automatic clustering of 2D trajectory data, useful for analyzing movement patterns in physics, mobility, and biology.

tools.name: pydiffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Rotational Diffusion Tensor analysis from MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: A tool to analyze rotational diffusion tensors from molecular dynamics simulations, aiding in the study of molecular reorientation and dynamics.

tools.name: ammolite
tools.one_line_profile: Bridge between Biotite and PyMOL for structure visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that enables direct visualization of Biotite structure data (AtomArrays) within PyMOL, facilitating seamless workflow between analysis and visualization.

tools.name: TopoAna
tools.one_line_profile: Topology analysis tool for high energy physics experiments
tools.detailed_description: A generic tool designed for the topology analysis of inclusive Monte-Carlo samples in high energy physics experiments, helping to identify and classify particle decay processes.

tools.name: rdfpy
tools.one_line_profile: Fast computation of Radial Distribution Functions (RDFs)
tools.detailed_description: A Python module for efficient computation of 2D and 3D radial distribution functions from particle coordinates, commonly used in statistical mechanics and materials science.

tools.name: ParticleSfM
tools.one_line_profile: Dense point trajectory based Structure-from-Motion
tools.detailed_description: A system for localizing moving cameras and reconstructing 3D structures by exploiting dense point trajectories, applicable in scientific imaging and reconstruction tasks.

tools.name: Optometrika
tools.one_line_profile: Optical image formation and ray tracing library
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB library implementing analytical and iterative ray tracing approximations for optical image formation using Snell's and Fresnel's laws.

tools.name: MDSAPT
tools.one_line_profile: SAPT energy calculator for MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A tool that interfaces MDAnalysis and Psi4 to calculate Symmetry-Adapted Perturbation Theory (SAPT) energies for structures from molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: pymol-color-alphafold
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin to color AlphaFold structures by pLDDT
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL extension that automatically colors AlphaFold predicted structures based on their confidence scores (pLDDT), aiding in the visual assessment of prediction quality.

tools.name: optsim
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for Optical Simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing various tools and utilities for performing optical simulations, including wavefront propagation and system modeling.

tools.name: Illustrate
tools.one_line_profile: Non-photorealistic biomolecular illustration tool
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran-based tool for generating non-photorealistic, illustrative renderings of biomolecular structures, widely used for scientific communication and figures.

tools.name: Atomic
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular visualizer for macOS and iOS
tools.detailed_description: A modern, native application for visualizing molecular structures on Apple platforms, supporting various file formats and rendering modes.

tools.name: ProLIF
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Ligand Interaction Fingerprints generator
tools.detailed_description: A library to generate interaction fingerprints for protein-ligand complexes from molecular dynamics trajectories or docking poses, facilitating analysis of binding modes.

tools.name: ai2-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for AI-enhanced ab initio computational chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit that integrates artificial intelligence with ab initio methods for computational chemistry, aiming to accelerate simulations and improve accuracy.

tools.name: Robotics (Cognitoware)
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic state estimation and Bayes filters library for robotics and dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library providing probabilistic state estimation methods including Kalman filters, Markov chains, and particle filters. It supports various probability distribution representations (Gaussian, uniform, discrete) and linear algebra operations, suitable for modeling dynamics and sensor fusion in robotics and physical systems.

tools.name: PyMOLfold
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for predicting and folding protein structures
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for PyMOL that allows users to fold protein sequences into 3D structures directly within the visualization environment. It integrates structure prediction capabilities into the standard molecular visualization workflow.

tools.name: MolArt
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based molecular structure annotator and visualizer
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library for visualizing macromolecular structures and mapping sequence annotations onto the 3D structure. It bridges the gap between sequence data and structural visualization, useful for analyzing functional sites in proteins.

tools.name: ipymol
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for controlling PyMOL sessions via IPython/Jupyter
tools.detailed_description: A library that enables the control of PyMOL visualization sessions directly from IPython or Jupyter Notebooks. It facilitates reproducible visualization workflows and automated image generation for molecular dynamics and structural biology.

tools.name: RMD_Digging
tools.one_line_profile: Pre- and post-processing toolkit for Reactive Molecular Dynamics (ReaxFF)
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based toolkit for analyzing reactive molecular dynamics simulations. It includes functions for formatting force field parameters, statistical analysis of structures and trajectories, mechanism tracking, and visualization output generation.

tools.name: MDSynthesis
tools.one_line_profile: Data management and persistence engine for molecular dynamics trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to manage the logistics of molecular dynamics simulations. It provides a persistence engine to organize trajectories and analysis results, making it easier to handle large datasets and complex simulation workflows.

tools.name: Fred
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Fréchet and DTW distance library for trajectory clustering
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library (with Python bindings) for calculating Fréchet and Dynamic Time Warping (DTW) distances. It is optimized for clustering polygonal curves and trajectories, useful in analyzing particle paths or time-series data.

tools.name: hotspot3d
tools.one_line_profile: 3D hotspot mutation proximity analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for identifying spatial clusters (hotspots) of mutations in 3D protein structures. It analyzes proximity of mutations in the folded structure, which is critical for understanding functional impacts in genomics and structural biology.

tools.name: OrbitalTrajectories.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Orbital trajectory design and analysis library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for designing, optimizing, and analyzing spacecraft orbits and transfers. It provides high-performance simulations of astrodynamical models, fitting the domain of dynamical systems and trajectory analysis.

tools.name: contact_map
tools.one_line_profile: Contact map analysis for biomolecules based on MDTraj
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for calculating and analyzing contact maps from molecular dynamics trajectories. It builds upon MDTraj to provide tools for identifying residue-residue interactions and their evolution over time.

tools.name: performance
tools.one_line_profile: Assessment of regression models performance and quality
tools.detailed_description: An R package to compute various performance metrics for statistical models (R2, ICC, AIC, etc.). While general-purpose, it is heavily used in scientific statistical analysis for model validation and inference.

tools.name: FUSCA
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for Unified Single-Cell Analysis and trajectory reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A software package for single-cell data analysis, featuring modules for reconstructing complex single-cell trajectories (CellRouter) and inferring intercellular communication networks. It applies dynamical systems concepts to biological data.

tools.name: matlab_trajectory_tools
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB tools for trajectory display and transformation analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of MATLAB tools developed by ETHZ ASL for analyzing, transforming, and visualizing trajectories, primarily for robotics and physical systems.

tools.name: PoincareMaps
tools.one_line_profile: Hyperbolic geometry methods for single-cell trajectory discovery
tools.detailed_description: A computational method that uses Poincaré maps and hyperbolic geometry to model complex cell trajectories and hierarchies from single-cell data. It addresses the limitations of Euclidean geometry in representing branching developmental processes.

tools.name: GRADE
tools.one_line_profile: Clathrate hydrate structure determination and trajectory analysis
tools.detailed_description: A code to analyze atomic positions of water molecules to identify and classify clathrate hydrate cages (5^12, 6^2 5^12, etc.) in molecular dynamics trajectories. It calculates order parameters and prepares data for visualization in VMD.

tools.name: ferritin
tools.one_line_profile: Protein structure data utilities and parser library in Rust
tools.detailed_description: A Rust library providing utilities for handling protein structure data, including parsing and processing PDB and mmCIF file formats, designed for high-performance bioinformatics applications.

tools.name: VMD Density Profile Tool
tools.one_line_profile: VMD plugin for computing 1-D atomic densities in macromolecular simulations
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for Visual Molecular Dynamics (VMD) that calculates one-dimensional atomic density profiles from molecular dynamics trajectories, useful for analyzing membrane simulations and interfacial systems.

tools.name: VMD Diffusion Coefficient Tool
tools.one_line_profile: VMD plugin for computing diffusion coefficients in macromolecular simulations
tools.detailed_description: A tool for Visual Molecular Dynamics (VMD) to calculate diffusion coefficients from molecular dynamics trajectories, enabling the analysis of transport properties in biomolecular systems.

tools.name: fresnel
tools.one_line_profile: Publication quality path tracing for soft matter simulations
tools.detailed_description: A python library for creating publication-quality ray-traced images of soft matter simulations in real-time, specifically designed to visualize particle data from tools like HOOMD-blue.

tools.name: freud
tools.one_line_profile: Powerful, efficient particle trajectory analysis library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for analyzing molecular dynamics and Monte Carlo simulation trajectories, providing high-performance tools for calculating correlation functions, order parameters, and other structural properties.

tools.name: gnn_tracking
tools.one_line_profile: Particle trajectory reconstruction with Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A library for reconstructing particle trajectories in high-energy physics experiments using Graph Neural Networks (GNNs), addressing the challenge of tracking billions of particles.

tools.name: tstop
tools.one_line_profile: Time-series topology data analysis tool suite
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools for Topological Data Analysis (TDA) specifically applied to time-series data, enabling the characterization and classification of dynamical systems and temporal patterns.

tools.name: mdciao
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and visualization of molecular dynamics simulation data
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for the analysis and visualization of molecular dynamics (MD) simulations, focusing on residue-residue interactions, contact maps, and other structural metrics.

tools.name: md-analysis-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for analyzing molecular dynamics trajectories using VMD
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python and Tcl scripts for analyzing molecular dynamics trajectories, interfacing with VMD to perform various structural and dynamical calculations.

tools.name: clusttraj
tools.one_line_profile: Agglomerative clustering for MD/MC trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that performs agglomerative clustering on molecular dynamics or Monte Carlo trajectories to classify and group similar molecular structures.

tools.name: pida
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis software for protein-protein interaction docking solutions
tools.detailed_description: Software for analyzing multiple protein-protein interaction docking solutions, calculating contact regions using mdtraj, and visualizing via nglview.

tools.name: Octopus
tools.one_line_profile: Offline calculation of particle trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran-based tool for the offline calculation of particle trajectories, suitable for physics simulations.

tools.name: taurenmd
tools.one_line_profile: CLI for analysis of Molecular Dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A command-line interface tool designed for the analysis of Molecular Dynamics simulations, facilitating trajectory processing.

tools.name: ssmodels-in-stan
tools.one_line_profile: State space models implemented in Stan
tools.detailed_description: A collection of state space models (dynamic linear models, hidden Markov models) implemented in the Stan probabilistic programming language.

tools.name: multiRegionPlasma
tools.one_line_profile: Electromagnetic field and charged particle trajectory modeling
tools.detailed_description: Program based on OpenFOAM to model electromagnetic fields and trajectories of charged particles in plasma physics contexts.

tools.name: angstrom
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for molecular architecture and visualization
tools.detailed_description: Ångström is a Python package designed for molecular architecture construction and visualization, aiding in materials science and chemistry research.

tools.name: exprorer_msmd
tools.one_line_profile: Mixed-solvent molecular dynamics engine and analysis tools
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools and an engine for performing and analyzing mixed-solvent molecular dynamics (MSMD) simulations.

tools.name: nMOLDYN3
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of Molecular Dynamics trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A well-established tool for the analysis of Molecular Dynamics trajectories, particularly focusing on neutron scattering observables.

tools.name: AtomisticReverseMonteCarlo
tools.one_line_profile: OVITO modifier for generating crystal structures
tools.detailed_description: An OVITO Python modifier to generate bulk crystal structures with target Warren-Cowley parameters using Reverse Monte Carlo methods.

tools.name: NShellFinder
tools.one_line_profile: OVITO modifier for coordination shell analysis
tools.detailed_description: An OVITO Python modifier designed to identify and analyze the n-th coordination shell neighbors in atomistic structures.

tools.name: WarrenCowleyParameters
tools.one_line_profile: OVITO modifier for Warren-Cowley parameters
tools.detailed_description: An OVITO Python modifier to compute Warren-Cowley parameters, used for analyzing short-range order in materials.

tools.name: FresnelMaps
tools.one_line_profile: Fresnel Zone generation for GNSS Reflection experiments
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating Fresnel Zones specifically for ground-based GNSS Reflection (GNSS-R) experiments, developed by domain experts.

tools.name: chemkit
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for molecular modelling and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for molecular modelling, cheminformatics, and molecular visualization, providing core components for chemistry software.

tools.name: molecular_data_explorer
tools.one_line_profile: Web app for visualizing molecular data and geometries
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool using Dash to create web applications for visualizing molecular data and geometries, developed at EPFL.

tools.name: vitruvio
tools.one_line_profile: Leg design analysis and optimization framework for legged robots
tools.detailed_description: A framework for rapid leg design analysis and optimization for legged robots, computing joint speed, torque, power, and energy for trajectory tracking.

tools.name: Motion-correction
tools.one_line_profile: Cryo-EM movie alignment and motion correction scripts
tools.detailed_description: Scripts for aligning cryo-electron microscopy direct electron detector movies on whole movies or individual particle trajectories.

tools.name: infresnel
tools.one_line_profile: Fresnel number computation for infrasound
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the computation of the Fresnel number specifically for infrasound applications, aiding in acoustic propagation analysis.

tools.name: Peridigm
tools.one_line_profile: Computational peridynamics code for multi-physics simulations
tools.detailed_description: An open-source computational peridynamics code developed at Sandia National Laboratories for massively-parallel multi-physics simulations, particularly for material failure.

tools.name: DBSCANSD
tools.one_line_profile: Java implementation of DBSCANSD trajectory clustering
tools.detailed_description: A Java implementation of the DBSCANSD algorithm, specifically designed for trajectory clustering tasks.

tools.name: clustering
tools.one_line_profile: VMD plugin for conformation clustering
tools.detailed_description: A VMD plugin to calculate and visualize clusters of conformations for a molecular trajectory.

tools.name: mol-draw
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight 3D molecular viewer component
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight, 3D molecular viewer library designed for integration into JavaScript and PureScript applications.

tools.name: stk-vis
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-platform molecular database visualization
tools.detailed_description: A cross-platform application for the visualization of molecular databases, facilitating the exploration of chemical structures.

tools.name: TrajSuite
tools.one_line_profile: Trajectory data-mining and visualisation suite
tools.detailed_description: A cross-platform Java application that provides a comprehensive suite of features for trajectory data-mining and visualization.

tools.name: MolSimToolkit.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for analyzing molecular dynamics simulations in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools for analyzing molecular dynamics simulations, providing functionalities for trajectory processing and structural analysis within the Julia ecosystem.

tools.name: VoronoiAnalysis
tools.one_line_profile: Voronoi analysis for MD simulations of solvated polymers/proteins
tools.detailed_description: Python code to analyze molecular dynamics simulations of proteins/polymers solvated in water. It calculates hydration shells, molecular volume, and Voronoi polygons using Voro++.

tools.name: maicos
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of MD simulations for interfacial and confined systems
tools.detailed_description: A tool to analyse molecular dynamics simulations specifically focusing on interfacial and confined systems, providing specialized metrics for these geometries.

tools.name: Dynamics PyMOL Plugin
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for molecular dynamics visualization
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the PyMOL molecular visualization system that facilitates the handling and visualization of molecular dynamics trajectories.

tools.name: pywindow
tools.one_line_profile: Structural analysis of molecules with voids and windows
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for structural analysis of discrete molecules with voids and windows, suitable for analyzing molecular systems and MD trajectories.

tools.name: PyEMMA
tools.one_line_profile: Markov Model Algorithms for molecular dynamics analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for the estimation, validation, and analysis of Markov state models (MSMs) from molecular dynamics data.

tools.name: adaptivemd
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for adaptive Markov state model simulations on HPC
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework designed to run adaptive Markov state model (MSM) simulations on High Performance Computing (HPC) resources.

tools.name: msmtools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for estimating and analyzing Markov state models
tools.detailed_description: A library containing core algorithms and tools for the estimation and analysis of Markov state models, often used as a backend for other MSM packages.

tools.name: pytram
tools.one_line_profile: Transition Interface Sampling and Reweighting analysis (Deprecated)
tools.detailed_description: A package for TRAM (Transition Interface Sampling and Reweighting) analysis. Note: This tool is deprecated in favor of PyEMMA but represents a valid scientific tool.

tools.name: variational
tools.one_line_profile: Variational approach for conformation dynamics
tools.detailed_description: Provides basis sets, estimators, and solvers for the variational approach to conformational dynamics. Merged into PyEMMA but stands as a component library.

tools.name: MDVoxelSegmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Voxel-based dynamic cluster analysis of MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing a voxel-based approach for the dynamic cluster analysis of molecular dynamics trajectories, useful for identifying aggregation or structural domains.

tools.name: trace_airmass_source
tools.one_line_profile: Atmospheric trajectory analysis and clustering
tools.detailed_description: Trajectory analysis software that produces time-height cross sections with residence time clustered by surface type, used in atmospheric science.

tools.name: GenUI Backend
tools.one_line_profile: Backend services for molecular generation and QSAR modelling
tools.detailed_description: The backend services of the GenUI framework, providing REST APIs for scientific tasks such as molecular generation, QSAR modelling, and chemical space visualization.

tools.name: Industrial-Robots-Simscape
tools.one_line_profile: Robot models for trajectory planning and analysis in MATLAB
tools.detailed_description: A collection of manipulator and mobile robot models for trajectory planning and actuator analysis using Simscape Multibody.

tools.name: physvis
tools.one_line_profile: Physics visualization library for MATLAB
tools.detailed_description: A tool to visualize physics simulations with simple graphics commands using MATLAB, simplifying the creation of educational or analytical visualizations.

tools.name: TrajMap
tools.one_line_profile: MD simulation trajectory visualization tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for the visualization of molecular dynamics simulation trajectories.

tools.name: MDToolbox.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia package for MD trajectory analysis and modeling
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for molecular dynamics trajectories analysis and modeling of biomolecules, providing statistical analysis tools.

tools.name: MichelaNGLo-app
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for PyMOL/PDB to NGL.js web views
tools.detailed_description: A web application tool to convert PyMOL PSE files or PDB files into NGL.js views, facilitating web-based molecular visualization.

tools.name: pycontact
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of non-covalent interactions in MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the analysis of non-covalent interactions in molecular dynamics trajectories, helping to identify contacts and interaction networks.

tools.name: mdtraj
tools.one_line_profile: Library for analysis of molecular dynamics trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive open library for the analysis of molecular dynamics trajectories, supporting many file formats and providing fast analysis routines.

tools.name: tftraj
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular dynamics trajectory analysis in Tensorflow
tools.detailed_description: A library that enables molecular dynamics trajectory analysis using TensorFlow, allowing for GPU acceleration and integration with machine learning workflows.

tools.name: topologyx
tools.one_line_profile: Topological Data Analysis Routines
tools.detailed_description: A library providing routines for Topological Data Analysis (TDA), which can be applied to complex datasets including physical and biological systems.

tools.name: metgem
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization of molecular networks based on t-SNE
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the calculation and visualization of molecular networks using the t-SNE algorithm, useful in metabolomics and chemical space analysis.

tools.name: NPBayesHMM
tools.one_line_profile: Nonparametric Bayesian Inference for HMMs
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB library for Nonparametric Bayesian Inference for Sequential Data, specifically implementing Beta process Hidden Markov Models (BP-HMM).

tools.name: trackintel
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for spatio-temporal analysis of movement trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A framework for the spatio-temporal analysis of movement trajectory and mobility data, providing data models and analysis functions for tracking data.

tools.name: Clustering
tools.one_line_profile: Clustering of molecular dynamics simulation trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A library for robust and stable clustering of molecular dynamics simulation trajectories, aiding in the identification of conformational states.

tools.name: MSMPathfinder
tools.one_line_profile: Finding pathways from a Markov State Model
tools.detailed_description: A tool for finding transition pathways within a Markov State Model derived from molecular dynamics data.

tools.name: dcTMD
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of dissipation-corrected targeted molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: An analysis framework for dissipation-corrected targeted molecular dynamics (dcTMD) simulations, used to calculate free energy profiles.

tools.name: msmhelper
tools.one_line_profile: Helper functions for Markov State Models
tools.detailed_description: A collection of helper functions and utilities for working with and analyzing Markov State Models in molecular dynamics.

tools.name: moleview
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight plug-in for 3D molecular visualization
tools.detailed_description: A fast and lightweight plug-in designed for 3D molecular visualization, facilitating quick inspection of molecular structures.

tools.name: md-tracks
tools.one_line_profile: Statistical analysis toolkit for MD and MC simulations
tools.detailed_description: A statistical analysis toolkit designed for processing data from molecular dynamics and Monte Carlo simulations.

tools.name: mol-view-spec
tools.one_line_profile: Standard for describing molecular visualizations
tools.detailed_description: A generic mechanism and specification for describing views used in molecular visualizations, enabling interoperability between visualization tools.

tools.name: molstar
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive macromolecular visualization library
tools.detailed_description: A modern, comprehensive library for the visualization and analysis of large-scale macromolecular data on the web.

tools.name: QUARTZ-EPIC
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of Retinal Vessel Topology and Size
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the quantitative analysis of retinal vessel topology and size, applicable in medical imaging and biophysics.

tools.name: qgis-trajectools
tools.one_line_profile: Trajectory data analysis tools for QGIS
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for QGIS providing a suite of tools for the analysis and processing of trajectory data within a geospatial context.

tools.name: pysplit
tools.one_line_profile: HYSPLIT air parcel trajectory analysis package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for generating, analyzing, and visualizing HYSPLIT air parcel trajectories, used in atmospheric transport modeling.

tools.name: pyGPCCA
tools.one_line_profile: Generalized Perron Cluster Cluster Analysis for coarse-graining Markov state models
tools.detailed_description: A Python package implementing Generalized Perron Cluster Cluster Analysis (GPCCA) to coarse-grain reversible and non-reversible Markov state models, useful for analyzing molecular dynamics trajectories.

tools.name: abcv
tools.one_line_profile: Python-based crystal viewer built upon fresnel and pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A crystal structure viewer that leverages the fresnel ray tracing library and pymatgen for high-quality visualization of materials.

tools.name: mdapy
tools.one_line_profile: Library to handle data generated from molecular dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for efficient handling and analysis of data generated from molecular dynamics simulations, providing various analysis functions.

tools.name: pesnet
tools.one_line_profile: Ab-Initio Potential Energy Surfaces by Pairing GNNs with Neural Wave Functions
tools.detailed_description: Reference implementation for generating ab-initio potential energy surfaces using Graph Neural Networks paired with Neural Wave Functions.

tools.name: stmol
tools.one_line_profile: Streamlit component for rendering molecules using py3Dmol
tools.detailed_description: A component for the Streamlit framework that enables the rendering and visualization of molecular structures within web applications using py3Dmol.

tools.name: NolinearTimeSeriesAnalysis
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for nonlinear time series analysis
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for performing nonlinear time series analysis, including phase space reconstruction, recurrence network construction, and complexity-entropy plane computation.

tools.name: FETA3
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for Evolving Topology Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based software framework for analyzing evolving graph topologies and networks.

tools.name: nglview
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter widget for interactive molecular visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Jupyter widget that allows for interactive viewing of molecular structures and trajectories directly within Jupyter notebooks.

tools.name: fractopo
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for validating and analyzing lineament and fracture trace maps
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing tools for the validation and analysis of geological lineament and fracture trace maps, useful in geophysics and structural geology.

tools.name: relax
tools.one_line_profile: Software for molecular dynamics analysis by NMR data
tools.detailed_description: A software package for the analysis of molecular dynamics using experimental NMR data, supporting various relaxation analysis techniques.

tools.name: VMD-SWTTV
tools.one_line_profile: Denoising algorithm combining Variational Mode Decomposition and Stationary Wavelet Transform
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of a two-stage denoising framework for 1D signals, combining Variational Mode Decomposition (VMD) with Stationary Wavelet Transform (SWT) optimized by Total Variation.

tools.name: modtox
tools.one_line_profile: Platform to analyze MD trajectories using ML and clustering
tools.detailed_description: An in silico platform designed to analyze molecular dynamics trajectories using various metrics, clustering algorithms, and machine/deep learning techniques.

tools.name: IQmol
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular editor and visualization package
tools.detailed_description: An open-source molecular editor and visualization software that allows users to build molecules, set up calculations, and analyze results, often used with the Q-Chem quantum chemistry package.

tools.name: NGLVieweR
tools.one_line_profile: Visualize PDB and structural files in R and Shiny
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides an interface to the NGL.js library, enabling the visualization and interaction with Protein Data Bank (PDB) and other structural files within R and Shiny applications.

tools.name: shinyNGLVieweR
tools.one_line_profile: Shiny UI for the NGLVieweR package
tools.detailed_description: A dedicated Shiny UI wrapper for the NGLVieweR package, facilitating the integration of molecular visualization into Shiny web applications.

tools.name: topopt-mgcg-matlab
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient 3-D topology optimization codes
tools.detailed_description: MATLAB codes for performing efficient 3-D topology optimization using multigrid Conjugate Gradient (CG) methods and approximate sensitivity analysis.

tools.name: openmm-plumed
tools.one_line_profile: OpenMM plugin to interface with PLUMED
tools.detailed_description: A plugin that connects the OpenMM molecular simulation toolkit with the PLUMED library, enabling enhanced sampling and free energy calculations within OpenMM.

tools.name: g_count
tools.one_line_profile: Gromacs tools for characterizing water movement in cylindrical regions
tools.detailed_description: A set of Gromacs-compatible tools (g_count, g_flux) to analyze the occupancy and flux of particles (e.g., water) through cylindrical regions like ion channels or nanotubes.

tools.name: DockingPie
tools.one_line_profile: Consensus Docking Plugin for PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin designed to facilitate consensus docking analysis, allowing users to perform and analyze molecular docking simulations within the PyMOL environment.

tools.name: PyPowerSim
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for simulation of power converter topologies
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for simulating standard power converter topologies, offering capabilities for waveform analysis, steady-state calculation, and transient analysis.

tools.name: wSterimol
tools.one_line_profile: Generate Boltzmann-weighted Sterimol Steric Parameters
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to calculate Boltzmann-weighted Sterimol steric parameters for conformationally flexible substituents, useful in quantitative structure-activity relationship (QSAR) studies.

tools.name: Mapper
tools.one_line_profile: R package for computing the Mapper construction from Topological Data Analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package that implements the Mapper algorithm, a tool from Topological Data Analysis (TDA) for visualizing and analyzing high-dimensional data.

tools.name: AeroSandbox
tools.one_line_profile: Aircraft design optimization and analysis tools
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for aircraft design optimization that leverages automatic differentiation for fast computation, covering aerodynamics, propulsion, structures, and trajectory design.

tools.name: INFOTOPO
tools.one_line_profile: Programs for Information Topology Data Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A suite of programs for performing Information Topology Data Analysis, applying topological methods to information theory contexts.

tools.name: atomsk
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for manipulating and converting atomic data files
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool for creating, manipulating, and converting atomic data files for materials science simulations (e.g., LAMMPS, VASP, Quantum Espresso).

tools.name: PLUMED 2
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source library for enhanced sampling and free energy calculations
tools.detailed_description: A library that works with various molecular dynamics engines to perform enhanced sampling, free energy calculations, and analysis of molecular systems using collective variables.

tools.name: polyhedral-template-matching
tools.one_line_profile: Polyhedral Template Matching algorithm for MD analysis
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Polyhedral Template Matching (PTM) algorithm for classifying local atomic structures in molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: Particle Flow Simulator
tools.one_line_profile: Simulator for 3D particle positions and trajectories from tree graphs
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based simulator that takes .swc tree graphs as input and outputs 3D particle positions as trajectories and steady-state frames, developed by the Provost Ultrasound Lab.

tools.name: PyMod
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for sequence similarity searches and homology modeling
tools.detailed_description: PyMod 3 is a plugin for PyMOL that enables sequence similarity searches, multiple sequence/structure alignments, and homology modeling directly within the PyMOL environment.

tools.name: BondPack
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of PyMOL plugins to visualize atomic bonds
tools.detailed_description: A collection of plugins for the PyMOL molecular visualization system designed to enhance the visualization of atomic bonds.

tools.name: Spatio-Temporal-DBSCAN
tools.one_line_profile: Spatio-Temporal DBSCAN algorithm implementation for trajectory clustering
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Spatio-Temporal DBSCAN algorithm, designed to cluster spatio-temporal data with irregular time intervals, such as GPS trajectories.

tools.name: MAGMATOMIX-UMD_package
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing package for ab initio molecular dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A post-processing package that performs analysis of structural, transport, and thermodynamic properties from ab initio molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: P2Rank
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning-based protein-ligand binding site prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: P2Rank is a standalone command-line tool for predicting ligand-binding pockets from a protein structure using machine learning.

tools.name: schrodinger_utils
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tools and integrations for Schrodinger/Desmond MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: A collection of integrations and analysis tools for the Schrodinger ecosystem, with a focus on Molecular Dynamics simulations run with Desmond.

tools.name: Restraintmaker
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to build restraints for Molecular Dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: Restraintmaker is a tool intended to build Position or Distance restraints for Molecular Dynamics simulations. It can be used as a library or an interactive PyMOL plugin.

tools.name: TDAstats
tools.one_line_profile: R pipeline for computing persistent homology in topological data analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package for computing persistent homology in topological data analysis (TDA), providing a pipeline for statistical analysis of topological features.

tools.name: Tracktable
tools.one_line_profile: Library for moving object trajectory analysis and rendering
tools.detailed_description: Tracktable provides a set of tools for analyzing and rendering the paths of moving objects (trajectories) in C++ and Python.

tools.name: VIAMD
tools.one_line_profile: Visual Interactive Analysis of Molecular Dynamics
tools.detailed_description: VIAMD is a tool for the visual interactive analysis of molecular dynamics simulations, allowing users to explore and analyze MD trajectories.

tools.name: PyMOL Open Source
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source molecular visualization system
tools.detailed_description: The open-source foundation of the PyMOL molecular visualization system, widely used for 3D visualization of proteins, small molecules, and other biological structures.

tools.name: scikit-tda
tools.one_line_profile: Topological Data Analysis for Python
tools.detailed_description: A metapackage and library for Topological Data Analysis (TDA) in Python, providing a unified interface for various TDA tools and algorithms.

tools.name: TaDAsets
tools.one_line_profile: Synthetic data sets for Topological Data Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A library for generating synthetic data sets specifically designed for testing and benchmarking Topological Data Analysis (TDA) algorithms.

tools.name: Vipster
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization and editing of periodic molecular structure files
tools.detailed_description: Vipster is a tool for the visualization and editing of periodic molecular structure files, supporting various file formats.

tools.name: VMD_python
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of Variational Mode Decomposition for signal analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing the Variational Mode Decomposition (VMD) algorithm, a non-recursive signal processing method used to decompose a signal into a discrete number of band-limited modes. Useful for time-series analysis in physics and engineering.

tools.name: MPTRAC
tools.one_line_profile: Massive-Parallel Trajectory Calculations for atmospheric transport
tools.detailed_description: A Lagrangian particle dispersion model designed for the analysis of atmospheric transport processes in the free troposphere and stratosphere. It performs massive-parallel trajectory calculations to simulate particle dispersion.

tools.name: pymol_viridis
tools.one_line_profile: Colorblind-friendly and perceptually uniform palettes for PyMOL
tools.detailed_description: A plugin/script for PyMOL that adds colorblind-friendly and perceptually uniform colormaps (like Viridis, Magma, Plasma, Inferno) to enhance molecular visualization quality.

tools.name: PyVibMS
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL plugin for visualizing molecular vibrations
tools.detailed_description: A PyMOL plugin designed to visualize vibrational modes in molecules and solids, aiding in the analysis of spectroscopic data and structural dynamics.

tools.name: PSICO
tools.one_line_profile: PyMOL Script Collection for enhanced structural analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive collection of Python scripts for PyMOL (Pymol ScrIpt COllection), extending its functionality for structural analysis, geometric calculations, and visualization tasks.

tools.name: loo
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient leave-one-out cross-validation for Bayesian models
tools.detailed_description: An R package for efficient approximate leave-one-out cross-validation (LOO-CV) and Pareto smoothed importance sampling (PSIS), widely used for model comparison and validation in Bayesian statistical analysis.

tools.name: tradeSeq
tools.one_line_profile: Trajectory-based differential expression analysis for sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A statistical tool for analyzing gene expression changes along biological trajectories (e.g., developmental lineages). It uses generalized additive models to test for differential expression associated with lineages and pseudotime.

tools.name: MoguTDA
tools.one_line_profile: Topological Data Analysis toolkit for simplicial complexes
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for Topological Data Analysis (TDA), focusing on simplicial complexes and algebraic topology computations. Useful for analyzing the shape and structure of high-dimensional scientific data.

tools.name: PyTDA
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for Topological Data Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A library for performing Topological Data Analysis (TDA) in Python, providing tools to compute persistent homology and other topological features from data sets.

tools.name: proteinpaint
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization framework for genomic and protein data integration
tools.detailed_description: A web-based visualization application for exploring genomic alterations (mutations, fusions) in the context of protein structure and function. Developed by St. Jude Children's Research Hospital.

tools.name: OLIGAMIX
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for tracking oligomerization states in MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight analysis tool designed to track oligomerization states and inter-chain contact networks from molecular dynamics (MD) simulation trajectories. Developed by the Strodel group.

tools.name: r3dmol
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for 3D molecular visualization using 3Dmol.js
